title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: A substantially revised fourth edition of a comprehensive textbook, including new coverage of recent advances in deep learning and neural networks.
author: Ethem Alpaydin

title: Machine Learning from Weak Supervision
description: Fundamental theory and practical algorithms of weakly supervised classification, emphasizing an approach based on empirical risk minimization.
author: Masashi Sugiyama

title: Algorithms for Decision Making
description: A broad introduction to algorithms for decision making under uncertainty, introducing the underlying mathematical problem formulations and the algorithms for solving them.
author: Mykel Kochenderfer

title: Essentials of Compilation
description: A hands-on approach to understanding and building compilers.
author: Jeremy G. Siek

title: Automata Theory
description: A comprehensive introduction to automata theory that uses the novel approach of viewing automata as data structures.
author: Javier Esparza

title: Computability and Complexity
description: A clear, comprehensive, and rigorous introduction to the theory of computation.
author: Hubie Chen
